channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 5 charged in drug investigation into Matthew Perry's ketamine death: Source
item.description: Matthew Perry died on Oct. 28, 2023, at the age of 54. An autopsy revealed he died from the acute effects of ketamine.

item.title: Plumes of smoke rise from town in southern Lebanon as tensions escalate between Hezbollah and Israel
Pan-Mass Challenge bike-a-thon has become a force for cancer research
item.description: The Pan-Mass Challenge, an annual bike-a-thon held in Massachusetts, has evolved into an annual tradition that draws nearly 7,000 cyclists from around the globe.

item.title: US shoppers sharply boosted spending at retailers in July despite higher prices
item.description: Americans stepped up spending at retailers last month by the most in a year and a half, easing concerns that the economy might be weakening under the pressure of higher prices and elevated interest rates

item.title: Donald Trump asks judge to delay sentencing in hush money case until after November election
"48 Hours" show schedule: A summer of crime time double features
item.description: True crime. Real justice. To miss it would be a crime.

item.title: Police make multiple arrests tied to fatal shooting of actor Johnny Wactor: Sources
item.description: An operation is underway Thursday by the Los Angeles Police Department to make arrests in the murder of "General Hospital" actor Johnny Wactor.

item.title: Hidden-camera video shows Project 2025 co-author discussing his secret work preparing for a second Trump term
Arrests made in investigation of Matthew Perry's ketamine overdose death
item.description: The arrests come nearly a year after "Friends" actor Matthew Perry, 54, was found unresponsive in the jacuzzi of his home in the Pacific Palisades area of Los Angeles on Oct. 28, 2023.

item.title: WATCH: Jodie Sweetin recreates iconic ‘Full House’ dance
item.description: The "Full House" star, who portrayed Stephanie Tanner on the show, recreated the dance routine with Mitchell Gerrard Johnson.

item.title: Medicare announces lower prices on 10 common, high-cost drugs
Economy 4.0
item.description: Economy 4.0, often referred to as the Fourth Industrial Revolution, signifies a profound transformation in the global economic landscape, driven by the extensive integration of digital technologies and automation across various industries. Key innovations defining Economy 4.0 include Artificial Intelligence (AI), the Internet of Things (IoT), Big Data, Machine Learning (ML), Sustainability and Green Technologies, and collaborative efforts between governments, industry professionals, and academics. Economy 4.0 aims to showcase society's transition towards an interconnected and technologically advanced economy, highlighting how the integration of technology into daily life empowers individuals and society as a whole.

item.title: LIVE: Authorities speak after arrests in Matthew Perry’s death: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: A doctor who says he's reversed his age by 20 years eats these 7 foods every week to boost his longevity
Taylor Swift's Eras Tour resumes in London after foiled terror plot
item.description: Taylor Swift's blockbuster "Eras Tour" resumed in London on Thursday after her concerts in Vienna were canceled earlier this month because of an alleged terror plot.
